name: The elastivaca game
description:
Instrucción:

WASD to move the cow.

In game: 

You can reset the cow just clicking on the arrow on the top-right site of the screen

Description:

The cow Daisy has been captured by aliens... You need to help her escape!!

Programmer : Mayxen 

Art : Moyashi
